title: Preference strength
description: How strongly these tendencies feel true for you most of the time. These lightly tilt your archetype scores (they do not dominate).

questions.question_text: Playful sparks and tiny dares are a go-to way I reset energy and get moving.
When a moment feels flat, I naturally turn it into a quick game or prompt.
A steady drip of novelty (small twists, new angles) matters to me week-to-week.
If a more interesting thread appears, I enjoy pivoting mid-plan to follow curiosity.
Private, cozy settings with familiar rhythms are my default sweet spot.
Predictable pacing helps me feel grounded and presentâ€”even during excitement.
Clean, decisive beats (A/B calls, clear tempo) feel kinder than hovering in uncertainty.
Challenge and a bit of pressure bring out my best focus and enjoyment when trust is present.
Quality and finesse (pacing, texture, presentation) meaningfully influence my desire and engagement.
Symmetry, staging, and small details catch my attention and elevate the experience for me.
Naming what we want to feel (not just what to do) deepens my interest and connection.
Mentor-style guidance (clear, kind, thoughtful) is especially attractive to me when I trust the person offering it.
Small rituals or symbolic cues (a word, a look, a token) noticeably shift my headspace in a good way.
A slow-burn build and anticipation often feel richer to me than fast payoffs.
